humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the patient has micrometastases in 1 out of 15 assessed axillary lymph nodes (No I/XV). Based on the AJCC staging system, this corresponds to N1. The report does not mention any other locations of metastases, so we can ignore any substaging information. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates the presence of micrometastases in 1 out of 15 axillary lymph nodes (No I/XV). This corresponds to pathologic N1 (pN1) stage. The substaging information (mi) is not considered in this case. Therefore, the N stage is N1.
